props.activator: Designate a custom activator when the activator slot is not used. String can be any valid querySelector and Object can be any valid Node
props.allowOverflow: Removes overflow re-positioning for the content
props.inputActivator: Sets a new activator target for the detached element. Use when placing detachable items in `v-input` slots
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the content
props.minWidth: Sets the minimum width for the content
props.nudgeBottom: Nudge the content to the bottom
props.nudgeLeft: Nudge the content to the left
props.nudgeRight: Nudge the content to the right
props.nudgeTop: Nudge the content to the top
props.offsetOverflow: Causes the component to flip to the opposite side when repositioned due to overflow
props.positionX: Used to position the content when not using an activator slot
props.positionY: Used to position the content when not using an activator slot
props.zIndex: The z-index used for the component
